import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar, Badge, Nav, Container,containerFluid, Row, Form, Button, FormControl, NavDropdown, ListGroup, Dropdown, ButtonGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { DropdownSubmenu, NavDropdownMenu} from "react-bootstrap-submenu"; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import {InlineShareButtons} from 'sharethis-reactjs'; function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const [Keyword, setKeyword] = useState('') let history = useHistory() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(Keyword){ history.push(`/?keyword=${Keyword}`) } else { history.push(history.push(history.location.pathname)) } } const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
+8801792-777660 support@laksura.com.bd Download Our App Now
setKeyword(e.target.value)} />
Cart {cartItems.length}
Merchant Zone
à§³ {cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.price, 0).toFixed(2)}
{userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ): ( Login/Register )}

Laksura Mall
All Campaigns
) } export default Header
